page.title: 03FOOTBALL CLUB IN MAULDEN
page.content: In{Maulden}we have just one football club,with teams for the under 11, 12, 14, 16 and men.The men play on Sunday mornings and the under 12's which I am in, practices on{Saturday mornings}and play matches on{Sundays.}We have two divisons and we are nearly at the bottom of the second divison(1985). We have to play each team at home and away. The same happens for each age group.The age groups each get a news letter nearly every month saying what will be happening soon.The club organise trips to see the matches played at Wembley.At the end of the season each person is given a medal for playing and asked if he would like to play next season.We play football at the{Maulden Recreation Ground.}The under 12's also practice on the {Alameda School field. {
